alert.note: Alert for Hopkins; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 01 at 5:47PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN SPENCER...CENTRAL DAVIESS...SOUTHEASTERN HENDERSON...NORTHWESTERN MCLEAN...NORTHEASTERN HOPKINS AND NORTHEASTERN WEBSTER COUNTIES... At 446 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Beech Grove, or 8 miles northwest of Calhoun, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Owensboro, Masonville, St. Joseph, Beech Grove, Stanley and Moseleyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 165 between Mile Markers 64 and 70. Interstate 69 in Kentucky near Mile Marker 137. Audubon Parkway between Mile Markers 13 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
